Headline: #J14 Jeffrey Jump Temporary Northbound Reroute near
ShortDescription: NB J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are rrtd via Jeffrey, Marquette, Stony Island, Lake Park, 47th & Lake Shore Dr due to fire department activity nr Lake Shore Dr/57th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey, Marquette, Stony Island, Lake Park, 47th, then resume their normal route on Lake Shore Drive due to fire department activity near Lake Shore Drive/57th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
